title: Nvidia Earnings Are the Stock Market Risk Event After Fed Rally
description: Traders are breathing easier heading into this week after Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell indicated that interest rate cuts are coming. The next test for the stock market will be a read on what’s been driving gains for the past few years: artificial intelligence euphoria.

title: Data Centre Industry Entering Phase Of Unprecedented Growth: Nxtra CEO
description: The data centre industry is entering a phase of unprecedented growth, Nxtra CEO Ashish Arora has said, adding that as artificial intelligence, cloud, and digital connectivity redefines lives and work, the underlying infrastructure, too, must be future-ready technologically, operationally, and environmentally. In its sustainability report 2025 listing out its key achievements, Nxtra by Airtel said 49% of the total power consumed at core data centres was sourced from renewable energy sources.

title: A Better Way to Think About AI
description: Artificial intelligence is ready to collaborate. Why fixate on automation?
content:
No one doubts that our future will feature more automation than our past or present. The question is how we get from here to there, and how we do so in a way that is good for humanity.
